title: [K-12] The Meaning and Application of Intuition in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge (linear algebra, calculus, etc.)
context.additional_context: A limited but stable mobile learning environment based on smartphones, training intuitive approaches to mathematical problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can consciously recognize and articulate their intuition during mathematical problem-solving processes
Learners can implement step-by-step mathematical modeling processes utilizing intuitive reasoning
Learners can analyze intuitive error cases, understand error generation mechanisms, and propose correction strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
